Module com.champlain.oop2assignment2
Package com.champlain.oop2assignment2

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
com.champlain.oop2assignment2.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardSource, Iterable<Card>
public class Deck extends Object implements CardSource, Iterable<Card>
Class representing a deck of cards and its actions.

The class implements the CardSource interface and the Iterable interface.

    • draw

      public Card draw()
      Method to draw a card

      The method draws the last card in the deck and remove it since it's not part of the deck anymore.

      Specified by:
      draw in interface CardSource
      Returns:
      the last card in the deck.

      Method to verify the state of the deck (empty or not empty).
      Specified by:

      Returns:
